Package com.pump.image

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ARGBPixelGrabber
    This is based conceptually on the java.awt.image.PixelGrabber class, except this is designed to be optimized for several types of BufferedImages.
    BasicImageContext
    This is a simple Java implementation of image transformations.
    BrushedMetalLook
    This contains static methods related to a brushed metal look.
    ImageBounds  
    ImageComparison
    This contains static methods related to comparing images.
    ImageContext
    This context paints a BufferedImage using 4 corner points.
    ImageContextFactory
    A factory for ImageContext objects to render images.
    ImageLoader
    This class can convert an abstract Image into a ARGB BufferedImage.
    ImageSize
    A collection of static methods to fetch the dimensions of an image.
    MutableBufferedImage
    This is a BufferedImage that offers a setProperty() method.
    ScalingJPEGDemo
    This app uses a large sample JPEG (a few thousand pixels wide) and applies different scaling techniques.
    SCImageContext
    Spatial-Coherence optimized implementation of ImageContext.
